quote: Take time like the river that never grows stale. Keep going and steady. No hurry, no rush. – Rumi
fact: The cruise liner, Queen Elizabeth II, moves only six inches for each gallon of diesel that it burns.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Whats a penguins favorite relative? Aunt Arctica.
